attributes.action: McDonald’s not to bring back plastic straws and all plastics recycled and reused
attributes.additional_details: By recycling all plastics and melting it down and reusing it would help the environment instead of it being lanfilled or dumped in our oceans it can be used again for example garden fencing or council bins, homes for homeless people in poor country’s etc
attributes.background: Plastics and many other materials is effecting our wildlife and environment with a big impact, plastic could be melted down and recycled and made into many useful things for example it could be melted down and used for garden fences and ornaments, bins, homes for homeless people all around the world

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for McDonalds and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257540
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684
